title: S12 Ep61: A Mystery of History: The Shroud of Turin
itunes:title: A Mystery of History: The Shroud of Turin
description:
Joseph Marino, a former Benedictine monk, has been studying the Shroud of Turin, believed by many to the burial cloth of Jesus, since 1977. Today we look into the fascinating history of this relic and the the facts that point to its authenticity.

Joe Marino: http://newvistas.homestead.com/
